title: Doesn't work
comment: Installed it on my tablet. Got no dialogues or anything. After making a character (no idea what I made I didn't see any options) get in the game and the keyboard doesn't work either.
Too hard to work with a tablet (note to developers: tablets don't generally come with a "take call" button).
Horrible game never download ur games again
Small and bad controls

title: Difficult, but worth it.
comment: Great game! Very unique and interesting mechanics. Definitely not for the faint of heart (or mind).  Touch controls can be a bit awkward, but changing the Geometry to 4-directional or Hex can help.  Kept crashing on startup for me, though. Dev's suggestion to delete the save games helped, fortunately.

title: Hmmm......no.
comment: Check out DCSS or NH and all its variants, or go back to the forefather of all ROGUE!!!, these guys made great games with neolithic tools!!!  This just doesn't toe the mark.

title: Roguelike FTW
comment: Another gem in my favorite genre
Yikes.

title: mmmmmmmmmmm
comment: mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm

title: Uninstalled. At least port it over properly
comment: If you're going to bring an app from computer, don't be lazy about it! Make sure you do the job properly by converting the controls over. Too confusing to figure out movement let alone how to play. Very disappointed. Uninstalled

title: Worst controls for touch screen
comment: that I have ever seen. It is playable, so 2 stars. But not easily. Lack of usable controls kills the fun.

title: Where to start...
comment: Right off the bat I had problems.  Movement is not explained and I was not able to find an explanation of how to move anywhere.  After stumbling across the wasd setting somehow, I managed to get to the second scroll.  It was very hard to read as the lines overlapped each other on my phone (LG P870).  Then after that, I couldn't figure out how to attack the obstacle in the way or move past it.  Very frustrating.  Finally, put the tutorial in the game, not a website where its now buried or gone please.

Thanks for a review! Sorry, but I do not understand some of the problems you mentioned... Tutorial is included in the game, and visible in the main menu. It does not explain how to move, but you move simply by touching the screen. Attack mushrooms (obstacles) by moving into them (at least if playing Human without switched weapons).
Neat but requires a keyboard to enjoy

Thanks! The game has been originally designed for a keyboard, but should be playable with the touchscreen controls (although less convenient). If you have vol up/down buttons, they can be used to switch weapons (the most important action) easily.

title: Great game ruined by buggy cluster****
comment: I love the concept behind this game, and I'm definitely going to be downloading it for my Linux box. Unfortunately, the android version is horribly broken.  My brief experience was characterized by constant crashes. This might have had something to do with me using the soft keyboard instead of the poorly-made native controls. Regardless, a man can only take so many random crashes without flying into a fit of RAGE.  Basically, great game, unimaginably awful implementation.

title: B-
comment: AA

title: Old game port?
comment: I played this 20+ years ago on an XT lol. Still hard to even get started

Thanks for a review! I do not know what you mean... the first version of Hydra Slayer was written just a few years ago, and it is based on a unique combat mechanics, so I do not know how you would confuse it with an XT game?

title: Stopped working
comment: Reinstalled but no dice

Sorry about that. Reinstalling does not delete the savefile (as it resides on your SD card), so you could try to do it yourself (filename is hydroid/hydra.sav). The game asks to remove the savefile if it detects problems with loading, but maybe it does not work for some reason...

title: So confusing!
comment: Sooooo Confuiusiiinnng!!!!!!!!
No keyboard on samsung galaxy s 2
force close issue fixed. Good twist on roguelike.
Needs work but not bad..
POS. Never played a worse game. Only got 1 star so I could post.
Excellent game! There was an issue, but it was fixed within 48 hours!
Tactical, fun and very replayable. Nice to see a proper ASCII roguelike on Android.
